Laredo.Uni-Trade Stadium: The Uni-Trade Stadium is a baseball stadium in Laredo, Texas. The stadium is home to The Tecolotes de los Dos Laredos a Minor League Baseball team of the Mexican League and the Laredo Roses, a women's full-contact American football team in the Sugar N Spice Football League. The stadium is also used for youth soccer leagues, youth and prep baseball games, and concerts.
